name: Patagonia Los Gatos 1/4 Zip - Women's
description:
This high-pile jacket is deliciously soft. Burrow into its plushness for warmth in brisk weather. The body fabric is certified as bluesign® approved, so it has limited impact on the people and ecosystems where it was constructed.Textured, high-pile fleece is double faced for comfort, made of 100% polyester that 30% recycled.Contoured seams in back add shaping.Quarter-zip neckline and tall collar to block drafts.Set in sleeves for free movement.Hip-length cut.

        Sustainability






.bluesign-cls-1,.bluesign-cls-2,.bluesign-cls-3{fill:none;}.bluesign-cls-2,.bluesign-cls-3{stroke:#333;stroke-width:1.79px;}.bluesign-cls-2{stroke-linejoin:round;}.bluesign-cls-3{stroke-miterlimit:10;}

Bluesign











                      Bluesign® Approved Material
